steps.title: Combine all the ingredients in a saucepan.
steps.content: Combine all the ingredients in a saucepan. Bring to the boil.

steps.title: Lower the temperature and simmer for 45 minutes.
steps.content: Lower the temperature and simmer for 45 minutes. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Check its consistency.
steps.content: Check its consistency. It should look a bit like oatmeal (porridge)––if it still looks rice-like, add more water and keep cooking. [2] X Research source

steps.title: When it looks like oatmeal, remove it from the heat and let it cool thoroughly.
steps.content: When it looks like oatmeal, remove it from the heat and let it cool thoroughly.

steps.title: Push the mixture through a sieve to remove the larger pieces.
steps.content: Push the mixture through a sieve to remove the larger pieces. Alternatively, put in a blender (you might need to add a little bit more water). Pour into a suitable storage jar. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Store in the refrigerator.
steps.content: Store in the refrigerator. Use as required; apply from the jar using a glue brush. [4] X Research source
